document_data.mainbody:
Calimport Blend Tea was an herbal tea blend popular in Calimshan with its popularity on the rise along the Sword Coast in the late 15 century DR.
Calimport blend was made using the wild herbs that grew in the country of Calimshan. In the late 15 century DR, Calimport tea was bottled and imported. This tea could be found served hot as a popular mid-day special at the Cutlass inn in Luskan.
